entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of ice pellets. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 30 percent chance of ice pellets late this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of ice pellets or freezing rain. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. High minus 3. POP 70%
